metadata.title: CVE-2020-5238 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: The table extension in GitHub Flavored Markdown before version 0.29.0.gfm.1takes O(n * n) time to parse certain inputs. An attacker could craft amarkdown table which would take an unreasonably long time to process,causing a denial of service. This issue does not affect the upstream cmarkproject. The issue has been fixed in version 0.29.0.gfm.1.

criterions.comment: cmark-gfm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
python-cmarkgfm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
ruby-commonmarker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
haskell-cmark-gfm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
r-cran-commonmark package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
